ModMetaData.name: PlanetsidePew
ModMetaData.author: GarbageDayIsHereToStay
ModMetaData.description:
PlanetsidePew coming at cha by means of your friend: "GarbageDayIsHereToStay"
Guns are bundled in with the charge rifle research "Pulse charged munitions", made at the fabrication bench, and are mostly balanced towards higher rates of fire and longer burst sustain but lower bullet damage and accuracy when compared to base game guns.
Weapons tend to fall along the lines of: TR weapons (Red/White) having the lowest bullet damage and accuracy but highest rate of fire NC weapons (Yellow/Blue) having high bullet damage, passable accuracy but lower fire rate VS weapons (Purple/Teal) having medium bullet damage but decent fire rate with high accuracy
